Nerangs.ab: yeŋ́hē hātąm. tā sar guftan ēn gyāg hōm ud urwarām kōftag ō ī rāspīg dahišn ō ī dast ī hōy ī zōt barišn hāwan ō ī dast ī hōy nihādan ǰīwdān abar sar ī zōhr nihādan az yanīm tā ērman sar harw yazamaide ēsm-ē tāg ō ī ātaxš nihādan

"They have to recite yeŋ́hē hātąm until the end. At this passage, (the zōt) has to give the pounded hōm and urwarām to the rāspīg and (the latter) has to bring it to the left side of the zōt. He has to put the hāwan on the left side and to put ǰīwdān on the zōhr. (The rāspīg) should put one piece of wood into the fire at each yazamaide since the Yānīm until the end of the Ērman."
yeŋ́hē hātąm. skūrag andar mayān ī hōm pālā nihišn rāspīg pad sar ī čahār angust abar gīrišn be dast ī hōy ī zōt barišn ǰīwdān abar sar ī zōhr nihišn
"He has to put the bowl in the middle of the hōm pālā. The rāspīg has to take it with the tips of four fingers and bring it to the left hand of the zōt and to put the ǰīwdān on the zōhr."

yeŋ́hē hātąm. tā sar guftan ēsm ud bōy ō ī ātaxš dahišn zōhrdān andar mayān ī hōm pālā nihādan hāwan ō ī dast ī rāspīg dahišn tā ō ī dast ī hōy ī zōt barēd zōt hāwan nūn gīrēd ud rāspīg zōhr be gāh ī frabardārān barišn zōt abar gīrišn u-š ǰīvdān abar sar ī zōhr nihišn tā yāšōtan az yānīm tā ā. airiiə̱mā pad harw yazamaide ēsm-ē ō ī ātaxš dahišn

"They have to recite yeŋ́hē hātąm until the end. (The rāspīg) should give one piece of wood to the fire. (The zōt) should put the zōhrdān in the middle of the hōm pālā and the has to give the hāwan to the hand of the rāspīg so that he brings it to the left hand of the zōt. The zōt takes now the hāwan. The rāspīg has to go to the place of the frabardārān and the zōt has to take it and he has to put the ǰīwdān on the zōhr until yāšōtan. From Yānīm until ā. airiiə̄mā, (the rāspīg) has to give a piece of ēsm to the fire at each yazamaide."
